original_text: The Lord gave wisdom to Solomon, as he had promised to do. King Hiram and King Solomon made an agreement that their nations would not fight against each other. So there was peace between them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 말씀대로 솔로몬에게 지혜를 주신 고로 히람과 솔로몬이 친목하여 두 사람이 함께 약조를 맺었더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord gave wisdom to Solomon
as he had promised to do
King Hiram and King Solomon made an agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 히람 왕과 솔로몬 왕은 약정을 맺었다

sentences.original_text: that their nations would not fight against each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 나라들이 서로 싸우지 않을 것이라는

sentences.original_text: So there was peace between them
